array.string: I. Global/Regional Dysfunction and Structural Alterations
Echo: Regional RV akinesia, dyskinesia, or aneurysm with PLAX RVOT ≥ 32 mm (PLAX/BSA ≥ 19 mm/m²)
Echo: Regional RV akinesia, dyskinesia, or aneurysm with PSAX RVOT ≥ 36 mm (PLAX/BSA ≥ 21 mm/m²)
Echo: Regional RV akinesia, dyskinesia, or aneurysm with fractional area change ≤ 33%
MRI: Regional RV akinesia, dyskinesia, or aneurysm with ratio of RV EDV/BSA ≥110 mL/m² (male) or ≥ 100 mL/m² (female) OR RV EF <= 40%
MRI: Regional RV akinesia, dyskinesia, or aneurysm with RV ejections fraction ≤ 40%
RV Angiography: Regional RV akinesia, dyskinesia, or aneurysm
